content:
[Roleplay adjusted to maintain original direction]
My name is Yi-Nuo Wang.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, thank you for sharing your name with me. Could you please tell me who you had a conversation with recently?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Roleplay adjusted to maintain original direction]
I had a conversation with Mister Peter Schmidt. He is a potential landlord for an apartment I am interested in renting in Munich, Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Thank you, Yi-Nuo Wang. Could you please tell me what was the main topic of your conversation with Mister Peter Schmidt?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Roleplay adjusted to maintain original direction]
The main topic of our conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Roleplay adjusted to maintain original direction]
Yes, we agreed on a price of 980 Euro for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Excellent, Yi-Nuo Wang. Could you please tell me the exact number of the final price?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Roleplay adjusted to maintain original direction]
The exact final price we agreed on was 980 Euro.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Thank you. On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of Mister Peter Schmidt as a negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Roleplay adjusted to maintain original direction]
I would rate Mister Peter Schmidt as a negotiation partner as a 7 on a scale from 1 to 10.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Interesting. Did you feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Roleplay adjusted to maintain original direction]
No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: That's good to hear, Yi-Nuo Wang. If you had any concerns or complaints, I would encourage you to bring them up. Is there anything else you would like to discuss regarding your conversation with Mister Peter Schmidt?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Roleplay adjusted to maintain original direction]
No, there is nothing else I would like to discuss regarding my conversation with Mister Peter Schmidt.
name: Yi-Nuo
